special_text:
[i](Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.)[/i]
When [i]Quest for the Lich’s Staff[/i] enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.
{1} Page [i]vii[/i]
{1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Draw a card.
{1} Page [i]xiv[/i]
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
